title: Survey on regretting tattoos in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 54.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 54.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 77.0 is found at Response No and the minimum is found at Yes where Response is 23.0.
Response Yes has 3.35 times less Share of respondents than Response No which is the highest.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 2 Responses is roughly 50.0.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
